author: CTPPS
body:
This update targets both Run 2 and Run 3.

For Run 2
  * for tracking RPs, the same data are used as in PPSOpticalFunctions_offline_v7 tag (to be used for re-miniAOD of Run2 data)
  * in addition, data for timing RPs are provided (useful e.g. for simulation)

For Run 3
  * current forecast for Run 3 optics is provided

We'd like that this update is applied to
  * 11_1 cycle
  * 10_6 cycle
title: Optical functions for Run2 re-miniAOD and a guess for Run3.
